titleInfo.title: Unprecedented and Differently Applicable Pentagonal Units in a Dynamic Library: A Keplerate of the Type {(W)W-5}(12){Mo-2}(30)

bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Schäffer C, Merca A, Bögge H, Todea AM, Kistler ML, Liu T, Thouvenot R, Gouzerh P, Müller A (2009)
Unprecedented and Differently Applicable Pentagonal Units in a Dynamic Library: A Keplerate of the Type {(W)W-5}(12){Mo-2}(30).
Angewandte Chemie. International Edition 48(1): 149-153.
